creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: center panel: curving, lightly moss covered trunk of a pine tree beginning LLQ, up through R; two swaths of green, one at URC and one in ULQ form pine branches; thin branches extending from left edge with white spots form plum branches
title: Maid of Ōhara, Pine and Plum Blossoms, Manzai Comedy, one of three panels
